specials.name: Radioactive Spew
specials.description: The irradiated dead spews a 30-foot cone of irradiated viscera from its mouth that deals 10d6 acid damage (DC 27 basic Reflex save), Creatures that take any damage from this are subjected to Medium Intensity Radiation. The irradiated dead can't use Radioactive Spew again for 1d4 rounds.

specials.name: Consume Flesh
specials.description: Requirements The ghoul is adjacent to the corpse of a creature that died within the last hour. Effect The ghoul devours a chunk of the corpse and regains 5d6 Hit Points. It can regain Hit Points from any given corpse only once.

specials.name: Medium Intensity Radiation
specials.description: Any creature that makes physical contact with the irradiated dead must attempt a DC 25 Fortitude save or become drained 2 and be inflicted with Radiation Poisoning that immediately progresses to stage 2 after the onset period.

specials.name: Radiation Poisoning
specials.description: Saving Throw DC 25 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 day; Stage 1 enfeebled 1 (1 day); Stage 2 enfeebled 2 (1 day); Stage 3 enfeebled 3 (1 day); Stage 4 enfeebled 4 (1 day); Stage 5 12d10 poison damage and enfeebled 5 (1 day)

specials.name: Radioactive
specials.description: Any attempts to Grab the irradiated dead afflicts the attacking creature with Medium Intensity Radiation

specials.name: Tear Flesh
specials.description: Trigger A creature grabbed by the irradiated dead critically fails a skill check to Escape; Effect The irradiated dead makes a claw Strike against the triggering creature.

immunity.value: death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, unconscious
